name: Cut Cut Buffet
description: Cut Cut Buffet is a slicing simulator for the ages, cut your way through mounds of food and multiple game modes. Can you stand the heat of the kitchen?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1000 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7 5820k equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX1060, or AMD Radeon R9 380 equivalent or greater Storage: 1000 MB available space
